home.title: Welcome to Interview Infinity
home.description: Your ultimate platform for interview preparation and job search in the tech industry
home.englishTitleAppDescription: Enhance your English vocabulary with our interactive learning platform
home.interviewGPTDescription: Practice interviews with AI and improve your interview skills
home.developerDescription: Find your dream job and prepare for interviews
home.companyDescription: Find the best tech talent for your team

developer.title: Join the Community and Create Tests
developer.description: Create and share tests to challenge your knowledge, using AI or upload your own test templates.

developer.title: Search and Apply for Jobs
developer.description: Browse and apply for tech jobs that match your skills and preferences.

developer.title: Create and Manage Resumes
developer.description: Easily manage multiple resumes and tailor them for different applications.

developer.title: Skill Assessment Tests
developer.description: Take tests to prove your skills and increase your chances of landing the right job.

developer.title: Track Application Status
developer.description: Stay informed about each application's status, right from your dashboard.

developer.title: Set Job Alerts
developer.description: Get alerts for jobs that match your career goals and skill set.

developer.title: Chat with employers
developer.description: Send messages to employers directly through the app.

company.title: Search and Evaluate Candidates
company.description: Find top talent with filters, and review candidates' test results.

company.title: Create Custom Tests
company.description: Create or generate skill tests in multiple languages and technologies using AI, or upload custom test templates.

company.title: Add tests from existing ones to your vacancies
company.description: Use pre-prepared tests and add them to your vacancies for a more accurate assessment of candidates. You can choose from a variety of existing tests that will help you assess the knowledge and skills of applicants.

company.title: Track Applicant Progress
company.description: Monitor candidates' test scores and progress directly within the platform.

company.title: Post and Manage Job Listings
company.description: List job openings and reach a large audience of tech professionals.

company.title: Flexible Job Posting
company.description: Post jobs with or without tests, allowing flexibility in hiring processes.

company.title: Record Video During Tests
company.description: Subscribe to enable video recording of candidates during tests for enhanced verification.

general.title: One Month Free Access
general.description: Enjoy a full month of free access without the need for credit card information.

general.title: Anti-Fraud Measures
general.description: Candidates can retake a test only after a week to prevent gaming the system.

chats.errorLoading: Error loading data. Please try again.

tests.noTestsFound: No tests found matching your criteria.

community.title: Community
community.createTests: Create Tests by Uploading a Table

aiTests.title: Generate Tests with AI Assistance
aiTests.description: Generate tests to 20 questions, specifying the technology focus. You can add a brief description (e.g., tests in english or for emerging technologies) to personalize the AI-generated tests.

companyTests.title: For Companies: Create Tests in Your Dashboard
companyTests.description: Companies have a dedicated option to create tests directly in the dashboard, where they can attach these tests to job listings for applicants. Candidates must complete the required tests before applying.

developmentNotice.title: Site Under Development
developmentNotice.description: This site is continuously improving. Your feedback is valuable to us! Please send any suggestions or comments to chat.

sections.introduction: Welcome to our platform! Here you can find useful articles, tutorials, and videos to help you get started.

articles.title: Articles
articles.description: Read our detailed articles to understand how to get the most out of our platform.

videos.title: Video Tutorials
videos.description: Watch helpful tutorials to guide you through the platform's features.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Find answers to the most common questions.

support.title: Need More Help?
support.description: Our support team is always here to help you with any questions or issues.

functionsOverview.title: Platform Features Overview
functionsOverview.description: Our platform offers a variety of features to help developers and companies streamline their processes.
featuresList: Create and share tests using AI or custom templates
Browse and apply for tech jobs that match your skills
Track your application status in real-time
Create and manage resumes tailored for different job applications
Find top talent by evaluating their skills with custom tests
Publish and manage job postings with flexibility in test requirements

jobPost.title: Post New Job
jobPost.informationMessage: Make sure you have filled in the basic information about the company! Without this information, the vacancy will not be created.
jobPost.exampleLocation: e.g., New York, NY or Remote

jobListings.title: Job Listings
jobListings.noJobsPosted: You haven't posted any jobs yet.

companyTests.addTest: Add a test from existing ones
companyTests.noTestsCreated: You haven't created any tests yet.

editTest.title: Edit Test

editTest.videoRecordingInfo: This test will require a video recording to ensure integrity.
editTest.question: Question

jobList.title: Jobs
jobList.noJobsFound: No jobs found matching your criteria.

ourProducts.title: Our Products
ourProducts.englishWordsLearningDescription: Learn English words effectively with spaced repetition and AI-powered exercises.
ourProducts.aiInterviewDescription: Practice your interview skills with AI-powered mock interviews and get instant feedback.
ourProducts.myDictionaryDescription: Create and manage your personal dictionary with custom word lists and study materials.
ourProducts.itCheatSheetsDescription: Quick reference guides for programming languages, frameworks, and development tools.
ourProducts.fitnessAIDescription: Get personalized workout plans and nutrition advice powered by artificial intelligence.
ourProducts.recipeSearchDescription: Find and discover delicious recipes from around the world. Search by ingredients, cuisine type, or dietary preferences.
ourProducts.englishWordsLearningLaravelDescription: Enhanced version of English Words Learning built with Laravel, offering additional features and improved performance.

tests.title: Test Creation
tests.description: Create custom tests and assessments with our intuitive test builder. Add questions, set time limits, and define scoring criteria with ease.

jobs.title: Job Search
jobs.description: Find your dream job or discover top talent. Our intelligent matching system connects the right candidates with the perfect opportunities.

interviews.title: AI Interviews
interviews.description: Practice interviews with our AI-powered system. Get instant feedback, improve your responses, and build confidence for real interviews.

testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials.alex: The platform has been instrumental in helping me prepare for technical interviews. The AI-powered practice sessions are incredibly realistic!
testimonials.sarah: As an HR manager, this platform has streamlined our hiring process significantly. The test creation tools and candidate assessment features are exceptional.
testimonials.michael: The combination of job search and skill assessment in one platform is brilliant. It's helped me showcase my abilities to potential employers effectively.
